about_the_game:
MeMic is an atmospheric stealth game with horror elements, where you take on the role of a mimic, able to disguise yourself as everyday objects. Immerse yourself in a dark world where each item becomes a tool for survival, and every enemy step could be your last. Your goal is not only to evade danger but also to explore a world filled with Easter eggs and references to popular games and pop culture, delivering a unique experience for every player.

Key Features:

  • Disguise Gameplay:Use your mimic abilities to transform into any nearby object—from chests to furniture. Hide from enemies, study their patrol routes, and choose the perfect moment to strike.

  • Hunt and Survive:Engage in a dangerous game of survival. Remaining unnoticed requires careful planning, as every movement and attack must be timed precisely. Can you evade adventurers and emerge victorious?

  • Atmospheric Locations: Every level is crafted with intricate detail—from lighting to environmental animations. These immersive locations pull you into a world where tension grows with each step, and even the smallest detail can either save or doom you.

  • Secrets and Easter Eggs: MeMic is filled with hidden nods to other games, iconic universes, and humorous touches for players to uncover. Each level holds tiny secrets, allowing players to feel like part of gaming culture as they explore and uncover these surprises.

  • Skill Rating:After each level, you’ll receive a rating (from S to D) based on how quickly and safely you completed the objective. Revisit levels to refine your strategies and improve your skills!

Ready for the Challenge?

Dive into a world where every corner hides a mystery, and every object can be your sanctuary. MeMic offers a unique blend of suspenseful stealth gameplay with humor and a deeply atmospheric experience. Prepare to explore, disguise, and survive — can you uncover all the secrets of this world?
